question: How would you implement a task delegation matrix to optimize team member growth while ensuring project delivery?
answer: Create a skill-interest matrix mapping tasks to team members' development goals and current competencies.
diagram:
flowchart LR
    A[Project Tasks] --> B{Assess Complexity}
    B -->|Low| C[New team member]
    B -->|Medium| G[Growing team member]
    B -->|High| H[Senior team member]
    
    C --> D[Learning opportunity
    Guided execution]
    G --> E[Skill development
    Independent work]
    H --> F[Mentoring others
    Complex problem solving]
    
    D --> I[Review & Feedback]
    E --> I
    F --> I
    
    I --> J[Skill matrix update]
